title: Nowhere to Run
description: A dominatrix is murdered; her body displayed in a show of dominance. An actress is found dead beneath the Hollywood sign. Stephanie Carovella left her career, her friends and her home town of Los Angeles, but she couldn't outrun the demons on her past. When she is lured back by the death of her best friend she enters a world where no one's safe.As her deepest and darkest secrets are revealed, Stephanie must find out who she can trust. Will it be Jesse Carlisle? Her ex-lover and the man she left behind. He would give anything to have her back in his arms, but is it enough?Or will it be Jase Devlin? Her best friend's boyfriend, and a man with secrets as dark and dangerous as her own. Can Stephanie find her friendâ€™s killer or will she discover that she has nowhere to run?
author: Nina D'Angelo
